name: Bokujyoukeieteki Board Game: Umapoly
overview: Bokujyoukeieiteiki Board Game Umapoly is a classic board game for up to 4 human players (using the multitap function) that uses the themes of farming and horse breeding. The game features 8 different characters (male and female ones to choose which one to play in the board), and 16 opponent characters to play againts. There are 8 different boards (4 can be selected at the beginning of the game and other 4 unlockables), with different terrains and themes (desert, woods, plains and a snowed board). There are different game modes: - Classic board game: Play a board game choosing one of the boards avaliables and against other 3 players (human or computer ones). - Stage Mode: Win all the different boards in this mode.
